entry.title: Saturday: Periods of snow. High minus 6.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Periods of snow beginning early this morning. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light early this afternoon. Wind becoming northwest 20 gusting to 40 late this afternoon. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 20 this morning and minus 10 this afternoon. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Saturday 11 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 26. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Clearing this evening. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light near midnight. Low minus 26. Wind chill minus 17 this evening and minus 34 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Saturday 11 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Mainly sunny. High minus 16.
